00068 int SimpleSocket::timedReceive( void* buffer, size_t len, int timeout)
00069 {
00070     struct pollfd poll;

00072     poll.events = POLLIN | POLLPRI | POLLRDHUP;
00073 
00074     int ret = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY (::poll( &poll, 1, timeout));
00075 
00076     if( ret == 0) return 0;

00078 
00079     if( poll.revents & POLLRDHUP)
00080         m_peerDisconnected = true;
00081

00083         return receive( buffer, len);

00085     return 0;
